name: Sewing Season
description:
Welcome to Sewing Season! A platform game made with unique mechanics that will spice things up! 

Your duty is to escape from the cave to set your soul free as the children that turned into dolls with no hope, they will lend you their powers to make your way out, things won't be easy, they will never be.

 "Don't you wanna play?" 

✦ FEATURES ✦

Keyboard controls:

  • User mobility - WASD
  • Shooting with keyboard - J
  • Jump - Space
  • Pause - Esc

You could also use gamepad!

  • Left Joystick - Movement
  • Right trigger - Shoot
  • A (XBOX) X (PLAYSTATION) - Jump
  • Pause - Start
WARNING ADVERTISEMENT ❢

Sewing Season is not a complete horror game, but some parts might be a ''surprising'' experience.

▸ Credits:

  • Art, Concept and 2D Animation by  Alicia Martos , Isabel Quispe anda Marta Casado
  • Programming and in-game animation by Sebastián Moreno
